Who We Serve

Our partners range from small independent practices
to large value-based care organizations.

Independent Practice

Increase your practice revenue with new RPM CPT (99453, 4, 7, 8) codes.

Medical Groups

Manage patient loyalty and relationships with our platform.

Accountable Care Organizations

Close Quality Gaps, reduce readmissions, and set the accurate risk benchmark with RPM data.

Direct Contracting Entities

Set the accurate risk benchmark and engage patients with our platform.

Health Systems

Manage discharge planning, increase patient satisfaction, and reduce readmissions.

Medicare Advantage Plans

Virtual Wellness Visits for Risk Adjustment/Quality. Seamlessly connect with your members.

Our results speak for themselves

"What gets monitored gets improved"

We tracked the blood pressure readings of the members who had over 160 mmHg systolic blood pressure over a month. We found that, on average, these patients could lower their blood pressure by 35 mmHg after the first 30 days of our Remote Patient Monitoring program.
NOTE: p-value < 2e-16
